medical_history.chief_complaint: Fracture of the right tibia and fibula sustained in a fall.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The fracture occurred 17 days before the FDG-PET scan. The patient also reported left chest wall pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: End-stage renal disease, bleeding duodenal ulcer 13 years earlier, extrinsic allergic alveolitis secondary to antihelminthic medications 6 years earlier, ruptured iliac aneurysm 3 years previously, chronic airflow limitation, coronary artery disease.
